scripts.prestart: node check-env.js DB_HOST DB_USERNAME DB_PASSWORD ADMIN_EMAIL WEB_URL TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN TWILIO_PHONE_NUMBER GOOGLE_MAP_KEY
scripts.test-coverage: npm test && istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -R spec --exit
scripts.install-local: npm install -g mocha & npm install -g node-inspector & npm install
scripts.migrate: npm run prestart && knex migrate:latest --env development --knexfile ./db/knexfile.js
scripts.rollback: npm run prestart && knex migrate:rollback --env development --knexfile ./db/knexfile.js
scripts.seed: npm run prestart && knex seed:run --env development --knexfile ./db/knexfile.js
scripts.dev: set DEBUG=grace-tree* & npm run prestart && nodemon %NODE_DEBUG_OPTION% server.js
